com.dhemery.core

Class DefaultingTo<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.core.Named
      • com.dhemery.core.NullSafeUnaryOperator<T>
        • com.dhemery.core.DefaultingTo<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of operand
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnaryOperator<T>

    public class DefaultingTo<T>
extends NullSafeUnaryOperator<T>
    An operator that supplies a default value if its operand is null. If the operand is non-null, the operator returns the operand.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultingTo(T defaultValue)
      Create an operator that supplies the given default value if its operand is null.

    • Method Summary

      Return the operator's value for a null operand.

    • Method Detail

      • operateOnNull

        protected T operateOnNull()
        Description copied from class: NullSafeUnaryOperator
        Return the operator's value for a null operand.

        This implementation returns null. Override this method to provide a value for a null operand.

        Overrides:
        operateOnNull in class NullSafeUnaryOperator<T>
        Returns:
        the result that the operator would produce for a null operand
